name: scroll-timeline-polyfill
description: A polyfill for scroll-driven animations on the web via ScrollTimeline

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run build-lite
scripts.test:wpt: npm run test-setup && cd test && cd wpt && (python wpt run --headless -y --log-wptreport ../report/data.json --log-wptscreenshot=../report/screenshots.txt --log-html=../report/index.html --inject-script ../../dist/scroll-timeline.js firefox scroll-animations || true)
scripts.test:simple: npm run test-setup && cd test && cd wpt && python wpt serve --inject-script ../../dist/scroll-timeline.js
scripts.test:compare: node test/summarize-json.mjs test/report/data.json > test/report/summary.txt && echo 'Comparing test results. If different and expected, patch the following diff to test/expected.txt:' && diff test/expected.txt test/report/summary.txt
